alert.note: Alert for Carter (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 07 at 3:53PM MDT until May 07 at 4:15PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM MDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL CARTER COUNTY... At 352 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 14 miles east of Lightning Flat, or 44 miles southeast of Broadus, drifting south at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of south central Carter County. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
